divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside having a smoke staring at the sky as usual. It was a clear day and I could actually see more stars than usual. All of the sudden an object appeared in the sky. It had a light blue glow and flew at an incredible speed due west. Then it made a sudden dip and disappeared. It was amazing and it was my first sighting of something I could not explain.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around May 9th 2012
Summary: The object was light blue and flew due west and made a sudden dip and disappeared.
